channel.title: 1992 on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in 1992 on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: The Internet's First Election
item.description: Today in Tedium: For the past 20 years, a familiar trend has exposed itself with the turn of every U.S. presidential election cycle: Each one is ever-slightly more defined (heck, even redefined) by technology, particularly online trends that have come along in the three years prior. In 1996, it was a coming-out party for the web. In 2000, the growth of online news began to have an impact on how we researched candidates.
